channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow edges up while S&P and Nasdaq waver as Wall Street digests economic data
Eight Fed districts reported flat or slightly negative growth: Beige Book
Want a more hopeful America? Increase awareness of past progress
item.description: At least two-thirds of Americans believe the nation will become economically weaker, less important, and more divided by 2050.

item.title: Trump and Musk are reportedly planning an ‘aggressive’ shake-up at the Department of Veterans Affairs, which would slash 80,000 jobs
item.description: "We will not allow our veterans to be defined as government waste," said Rep. Katherine Clark, the No. 2 ranked in House Democratic leadership.

item.title: Why Intel's stock is skidding toward its longest losing streak in 7 months
The ‘Trump bump’ has effectively disappeared after tariffs spook Wall Street
item.description: Analysts warn the slumping markets could be a canary in the coal mine for broader economic concerns.

item.title: When it comes to Social Security ‘fraud,’ Trump will have to put up or shut up
